Reviews_Description: Best SUV of the 21st Century. I bought this car a few months back. It's an HTK+ Diesel model. Overall, the style, body make, mileage, engine tuning, safety standards, and features are very good. I can recommend it to my friends and relatives. It gives good mileage in the city as well as highway conditions.

Very nice and comfortable car, KIA gives lots of features which no other car in the same segment gives. Thumbs up for that maintenance is low, service cost is also low as compared to others in the segment. Highly recommended to buy KIA Seltos, I can assure you that buyers won't be disheartened, they will cherish their decision to buy KIA Selto...

Rating_Title: Good Option For Sub Compact SUV
Reviews_Description: Driving Seltos since 2019. With the introduction of new cars like Mahindra XIUV 700, etc. The performance compared to it is quite low. But if looking for a sub-compact SUV, then it is value for money.

It is overall the best package for a family car. It offers you many features on a low budget also. I am especially a big fan of its look, it's amazing. I personally love this car and my family also liked it very much. Now it is coming with an update-6 airbag, improved suspension, and 4 airbags from base to HTK+. It is now also having drive traction...

Rating_Title: Overall This Is The Best Car
Reviews_Description: The car is having amazing mileage from 18kmpl to 26kmpl, and ac is also good. The sunroof is excellent, and overall this is the best car.
It is so good-looking car, and it has so many features. It has too comfortable to drive.

Kia Seltos gives you the best comfortable experience at a cost-effective price and its features are the best in the industry. 
Pros - mileage, looks, features, driving experience, power 
Cons- no panoramic sunroof, engine power
Best in the segment, great mileage, good driving, and comfort good on-road presence, loaded with features. Overall a good package in this price segment.
A good car for the family which gives a good mileage of 15-16kmpl. It is overall a good car. I own the top model of the car. It has very good features.
Excellent performance car. Its design, good looks and comfortable for family and for a long drive.
Superb car, it has good mileage and its features are also good. It looks decent and has a low maintenance cost. It comes with a powerful engine which is good and its performance is just amazing.

The overall space, comfort, and ride quality are decent. It's good in features, yet lacks in the build quality and premium touch in the cabin. There is a wide range of engine and transmission options available, which makes it easy to pick a model of our choice.

Rating_Title: Best Car At This Price Point
Reviews_Description: Road presence is great, but getting a good mileage in the city. But still, it's cool if we see the style and comfort. I have bought the base model. As it was under my budget and done some aftermarket modification of around 1.2L+ So it's not less than top model except few things. Really nice car offered by Kia at this price point.
Kia Seltos best premium car hai is pricing me, features bhi badiya hai or milenge bhi accha hai.
It is a good car in mileage, comfort, and features. Having a lot of space inside with a good interior.

The car is good in look and aesthetics but does not give you great mileage. Coming to safety it has scored just 3 stars on global NCAP so there is a compromise good thing is it has got a great feature from the HTX variant which makes the car stand out from other SUVs.
The driving experience is really awesome the engine is very smooth. The comfort is next level, with excellent pickup, superpower, and braking is great. Absolutely a perfect car.
Kia is a pack of features, but only one thing that makes Kia sales down is safety. It got only a 3-star rating, after spending 20 lakhs it is not good to get a 3-star safety quality car.
It is one of the most wonderful and valuable cars in India under the 15 lakhs category. Safety and performance are really good. Mileage is good in this category.

Rating_Title: Low Mileage And Engine Gets Overheated
Reviews_Description: I bought a Kia GTX turbo petrol. It's awesome looking and performance is really good but I felt the engine gets overheated in a short time, also I am getting very low mileage of 10kmpl in city and 13kmpl on highway.
Very good Kia is not a bad car in the price range and the comfort in this car we get is amazing. It gives good mileage and many more amazing features.
The build quality is too good and the performance of the car is very smooth. The car is loaded with many features.
Overall the most complete and stylish in this segment, the interior is awesome, good for one who is looking to upgrade or as 1st car in this segment.

It was just an amazing car it was like as comfortable as sitting at home and as well as its looks oh god I just loved this car and the road presence is dam good I loved this car if we talk about the milage it is also nice and the maintenance cost is also less as compared to other cars in this segment this car is amazing.

Rating_Title: The Beautiful Good Looking Car Seltos
Reviews_Description: The Kia Seltos is very good looking with attractive looks. The power of the car is very high level, and the mileage is also good. The cost of maintenance of this car is very low.
Very nice car with modern facilities and comfort. It has got awesome performance capabilities with ample space and features.

I'm owning this for about 1 year. Till my experience is fabulous. It is a very comfortable and smooth car with a lot of space like boot space is also large. Easy to carry a lot of things on a trip. I loved the car. It's awesome.
It looks fantastic car and has good mileage of around 20kmpl at this price. The comfort is also good.

This is an amazing car. It suits all kinds of people. If you want to go out this car can go anywhere like hills, offroad, suspension of this car is very good. Comfortable seating, especially the driver will feel more comfortable while driving.

The car is good. Mileage is good and I don't look at the global NCAP rating it is very overrated nowadays. The comfort level is too high. You can go for this car without even thinking as it provides you with ample features it is a fully-loaded car. A great car in the budget in fact I must say this is the best in the segment.
